content: hey guys welcome to another adventure project vid and this is going to be the
first adventure on farland Isle and we had a lot of fun you didn't use
aluminium a new game system with it and so the players were learning so I'm not
going to do play vids per se but I'm gonna do some kind of recap it's with
you guys if you're interested in seeing what happened so yeah so the players are
on a ship and they're they're leaving essentially the old world to the new
world with a lot of opportunities and that you know adventure opportunities
and they're on our old ship the captain's a little gruff and you know
the ship they're not sailors but the ship seems to creep quite a lot like it
seems like you know it's not in good shape but they did get the bargain pass
you know hey that always seems good until something happens and the ship's a
little too overladen you know he's taking too many supplies and of course
that's fine as long as the weather is good but as soon as this huge storm
starts rearing up you know the players are fighting for their lives and of
course the ship comes up pieces and the next thing you know they wake up and
they're on the beaches of farland Isles so let's go to the table and I'll talk
more about that our party consists of Knicks and health
assassin poppy knee a known warrior Zook and orc shaman and his ferret titania
twinkle toes and Ella a wizard for this gaming campaign I was going to run the
game with tales of blades and heroes which is a miniatures based RPG and I
really like the how it ran so I'll talk more about that later but right now
let's get on with the adventure so the players find themselves washed up on the
shore with all the wreckage they start to come to poppy knee the gnome warrior
on the end of the beach wakes up to a scream and her curiosity gets the better
of her and she heads down the beach to see where what it was the others are
just sort of kind of coming to and they hear something splashing in the water
behind them and they jolt up and it is some kind of fish creature lunging out
of the water at them they end up dispatching it and meet up they kind of
knew each other on the ship but didn't really weren't really a party so they're
just kind of comrades by association right now they're all in this situation
and they soon realize that well poppy the warrior doesn't have her armor they
do they did have their weapons on them but the Pina the warrior doesn't have
her armor and they go down I think it was searching down the beach to see if
they can find some chests or trunks or anything washed up on the beach as they
they find some stuff but there as they continue on the beach looking for more
stuff they see a some of the more the fish men kind of scrounging around part
of at a piece of the wreck looking through stuff
the peeny had found a that looked like someone been dragged in the water so
they realized that these probably looking for victims so a fight
ensues as I see each other and they also see some some supplies scattered on the
beach so it's another good reason to fight so they end up dispatching the
fish fish folk and finding having some really good luck in finding a Pappy
knees armor actually her chest as well as some other things that she had in it
so that was that was helpful they did find some food too which was really nice
and so that will give them some time to so they won't starve to death so they
can find some more stuff one of the other characters who is some photography
skills realize that that this is as far land Isle while they knew they were
passing farland Isle but knew knows a little bit about the island tells them
that there's a cliffs all the way around the island that they'll have to somehow
scale up those cliffs but she didn't notice when she looked up at the cliff
face that there were some dragon Hawks flying around near the top of the cliff
and it's actually several hundred feet high so not gonna be an easy climb so
the party moves on and they're kind of trying to look for some shelter maybe or
some more supplies and they find a cave and the cave has some pillars at the end
for an ancient civilization called the Utley Tian's
which died out a long time ago so they enter the cave the cave is
flooded and they entered the cave and they start plotting through the
waist-high water which is higher on some than others the fairy takes two
fluttering in so she doesn't get wet and while they're plotting through the water
one of the lumps that they thought was a rock turns out to be a large carnivorous
fish and it leaps up and attacks them does a big splash they have to fight it
in the water that so they finally take care of it
the major rather ingeniously takes care of it and so they move on further into
the cave and they find the rock section that's been this out of the
water and so they climb up on that and they see what looks like the skeleton of
a person a few a trunk enough and a crate and they see an old fire that
looks like it been out for a long time so as they investigate they see that the
the skeleton belonged to an old man and they they realize us from like these he
doesn't have a lot of teeth and this kind of thing so they look at the fire
the the the old fire it's been out for quite some time but they do realize that
the water must not raise high enough to wash all this stuff away so they're
they're fairly safe in here for the moment so they see that the fire has

the fire elemental in the fire that gives them some good information about

players rifle through the stuff they find some the wizard finds a magical
book which is nice for the tales of blade system because the players have
Wizards have to learn power words so that's kind of my in to give the wizard
way to learn power words but they also find a wand so they test the wand they
waste a few charges trying to figure out what it does and they realize it does
spider climb so and they asked the the fire elemental why why didn't the guy
climb up but he was an old man she says he was an old man and that he wasn't
able he didn't have the strength to climb up although he had the means he

entered the cave and the vision was a mat of a magical fountain and so the

that they're gonna do is kind of move the some of the wreckage further into
the beach so maybe if they need to make a boat or some kind of something with
the with the debris let them able to do that so they start
moving that stuff in and a few of them don't make their perception checks and
they're busy moving wood to the far end of the beach some of the others who do
notice that the some or the fish poker come out of the waters there's a large
pitch battle with a leader which is pretty tough but the players manage to

managed to dispatch them and all is good and so now they are faced with how are
they gonna get up these cliffs to the island which will happen next time hey
guys I hope you enjoyed this video recap of my first game on farland Isle also if
you really like this type of stuff make sure to check out two recent sources I
